DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare subjective drug like use Drug Rating Questionnaire , subject version ( DRQ-S ) , question 2 pharmacokinetics Vyvanse™ ADDERALL XR® administer oral solution . Hypothesis : DRQ-S , question 2 show difference two drug
DOC.brief_title: Compare Subjective Drug Liking & Pharmacokinetics Vyvanse™ ADDERALL XR® When Administered Oral Solution
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Healthy young adult , male female ( nonpregnant nonlactating ) , age 1825 year time consent Have body mass index ( BMI ) 20.0 29.0kg/m2 Satisfactory medical assessment clinically significant relevant Subject must demonstrate positive response amphetamine Screening Exclusion Criteria A history current recurrent disease could effect study Subject history seizure , tic disorder , current diagnosis and/or know family history Tourette 's Disorder Subject concurrent chronic acute illness condition might confound result safety assessment might increase risk subject Subject clinically significant ECG and/or laboratory abnormality Subject document allergy , hypersensitivity intolerance amphetamine Subject prescribe take amphetamine product past , include childhood ; recreational use may exclusionary per Investigator 's discretion Subject know family history sudden cardiac death ventricular arrhythmia Subject recent history ( within past 6 month ) suspect substance abuse dependence disorder ( exclude nicotine ) Subject participate investigational clinical vaccine trial within 30 day prior first dose study drug Subjects currently consider suicide risk , previously make suicide attempt prior history , currently demonstrate suicidal ideation
